name: dispatcher_club
description: Dispatcher and event manager: process_frame(dt), late-bound context, quad stream.

elements.name: Dispatcher (formal spec)
elements.description: Advance timeline, pop_ready(MidiRingBuffer), ExecutionContext, beat/bar callbacks.

elements.name: Event manager (formal spec)
elements.description: Registers and routes: MIDI→sequencer+audio, beat→playback, waveform, automation.

elements.name: Dispatcher equation (graph)
elements.description: process_frame(dt) = advance → pop_ready → ExecutionContext → fire callbacks.

elements.name: Quad stream over any sample
elements.description: Four streams: live MIDI, sequencer, waveform, +1; same timeline.
